commands.b: Here are the commands for this game:
Draw: Picks up a card from the draw pile and transfers it to your hand. Ex: 'Draw'.
Play (of card): Puts specified card on top of the discard pile if the move is legal. Ex: 'Play Green +2', 'Play Wild', 'Play Blue 5'.
Uno (of card): Plays the card if the card is legal and if you will have one card left in your hand after playing it. Ex: 'Uno Yellow 2', 'Uno Red Skip'.
Uno2: When the other player only has one card and has not called uno yet, you can call uno on them to make them draw four cards. Ex: 'Uno2 <player name>.
Rules: Lists the rules of our Uno game.
Commands: Lists the commands of this game.
